Our team advises clients on all aspects of labour & employment law. We consider ourselves partners collaborating with human resources departments and in-house counsels to assist  in their day-to-day labour and employment issues. Our team advises on:

  - Structuring and drafting various consultancy, contractor, labour and employment related agreements.
  - Sensitising employees on company policies during induction working with human resource team of clients.
  - Advice on employee termination and retention issues.
  - Drafting and review of various internal workplace policies and procedures.
  - Guiding clients on best practices in Establishments and Factories.
  - Conducting trainings and seminars on employment law related topics like PoSH, anti-bribery etc. 
  - Assist and guide in all kinds of internal employee related investigations. 
  - Draft and review employee related communications, service regulations and handbooks
  - Employment law audits on existing documents signed by clients with third parties who are its services providers
